text: Derek Sua (born 29 December 1987) is a Samoan judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the men's +100 kg, where he was eliminated by Abdullo Tangriev in the second round. Judoka Derek Sua of Samoa was awarded with a wild card for the Olympic Games 2016 in Rio where he fought +100 kg against Tangriev (UZB). ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Samoan male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Samoa Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: Derek Sua
